quote.text: And the light shineth in the darkness, and the darkness comprehendeth it not.
quote.author: John

quote.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten son, that whosoever believeth in him, should not perish, but have everlasting life.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Let he who has never sinned cast the first stone.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Greater love has no one than this, than to lay down one's life for his friends.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, [that] shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.
quote.author: John
